==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|の|o1=り|あ|o2=い|yomi=kun}}

===Etymology===
Conjunctive or stem form ({{l|ja|連用形}}) of compound verb {{l|ja|乗り合う}} ({{l|ja|のりあう}}, ''noriau'').

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|のりあい}}

# A [[meeting]] or [[encounter]] while riding a [[vehicle]].
# Riding a vehicle [[together]].
# By extension, people riding a vehicle together.
# Abbreviation for:
## {{l|ja|乗合自動車}} ({{l|ja|のりあいじどうしゃ}}, ''noriai jidōsha''): a [[carpool]], a [[rideshare]]
## {{l|ja|乗合馬車}} ({{l|ja|のりあいばしゃ}}, ''noriai basha''): a [[horse cart]] ridden by multiple people
## {{l|ja|乗合船}} ({{l|ja|のりあいぶね}}, ''noriaibune''): a [[ferry]] or [[passenger boat]]

* {{l|ja|乗合船}} ({{l|ja|のりあいぶね}}, ''noriaibune''): a [[ferry]] or [[passenger boat]]
